scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm start" "cd frontend && pnpm start"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm lint" "cd frontend && pnpm lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm lint:fix" "cd frontend && pnpm lint:fix"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm install" "cd frontend && pnpm install"
